_comment.chromaticarsenal.main: Any lang key that begins with _comment does not appear in-game. They serve to explain references and other things.
_comment.chromaticarsenal.main2: You may translate these, but there is no point.
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.glass_shield.1: §6Fully absorbs the damage of one attack, and then shatters
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.glass_shield.2: §6The shield takes %1$s§6 second(s) to repair itself
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.shadow_treads.2: §6Increases movement speed by %1$s§b%%§6 when in a light level of %2$s§6 or less
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.shadow_treads.3: §6Prevents activation of Sculk Sensors from walking or falling short distances
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.duality_rings.1: §dIncreases the effectiveness of Magic Garlic Bread
_comment.chromaticarsenal.friendly_fire_: A play on the term "friendly fire", as the flower resists both self-damage and fire damage.
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.friendly_fire_f: §6Absorbs fire damage at the cost of durability, and recovers durability over time
§6Upon running out of durability, takes %1$s§6 seconds to begin restoring durability again
_comment.item.chromaticarsenal.lunar_cry: In the below line, "Luna" is a name. If you bother to translate it, translate it as such.
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.lunar_crystal.2: §6Upon striking an enemy, has a 1 in %1$s§6 chance to inflict Levitation at level %2$s§6 for %3$s§6 seconds
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.cryo_ring.2: §6Causes thrown snowballs to deal damage and freeze entities
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.cryo_ring.3: §6Snow Golems built while wearing this inherit these effects
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.bubble_amulet.1: §6Provides the wearer with additional air before drowning
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.bubble_amulet.2: §6While drowning, allows the wearer to swim even faster
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.bubble_amulet.3: §6Refills over time while outside of water
§6Allows sprinting to continue on an empty stomach
§6Allows for landing knockback attacks in rapid succession
§cMakes the ground harder to walk on
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.advancing_heart: §6This curio's power is scaled by how many advancements have been earned
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.thunderguard.1: §2Grants immunity to Lightning damage and converts it into a movement buff
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.super_golden_he: §6This revival reduces max health by %1$s§b%%§6 for %2$s§6 seconds
§6After reviving, goes on cooldown for %1$s§6 seconds
message.chromaticarsenal.revival_cooldow: §6The Diamond Heart revival cooldown has finished.
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.super_glass_shi: §cCauses blindness, does not work against invulnerability-bypassing damage
_comment.death.attack.death_clock: Reference to Undertale, where Determination is a substance that can delay or prevent death, with...unfortunate side effects.
death.attack.death_clock.player: %1$s ran out of time while fighting %2$s
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.super_ward_crys: §6Reduces both positive and negative potion effect durations by %1$s§b%%
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.super_shadow_tr: §6Grants varying damage and speed bonuses depending on the time of day
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.super_friendly_: §6Melee attacks engulf the target in flames which cannot be extinguished
§6Damage dealt to burning mobs is increased by %1$s§b%%
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.super_lunar_cry: §2Grants immunity to fall damage and Levitation
§6Allows for bouncing out of the void, taking %1$s§6 damage in the process
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.ascended_star.1: §6Grants %1$s§6 extra fortune level(s) and %2$s§6 extra looting level(s)
death.attack.ascended: %1$s ascended to a higher plane of reality
death.attack.ascended.player: %1$s ascended to a higher plane of reality while fighting %2$s
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.world_anchor.1: §6The effects of this curio become more severe the further you are from the bottom of the world
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.cursed_totem.1: §cAttacked mobs are given the ability to revive once
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.cursed_totem.2: §cMobs which revive this way have %1$s§b%%§c reduced maximum health
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.gravity_stone.1: §6Prevents gravity from being reduced below the base value
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.gravity_stone.2: §6Prevents the floatiness from Slow Falling (the effect will still negate fall damage)
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.vertical_stasis: §6Negates the effects of gravity while sneaking
§6While in effect, sneaking won't prevent falling off ledges
_comment.block.chromaticarsenal.blahaj: Based on the IKEA shark plush of the same name.
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.blahaj.1: §6Prevents Phantoms from targeting or spawning near the wearer
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.harpy_feather.2: §6Can be used up to %1$s§6 times before landing
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.copper_ring.1: §6%1$s§b%%§6 chance to not lose durability when using a breakable item
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.cursed: §cOnce equipped, unequipping may prove to be fatal.
_comment.tooltip.chromaticarsenal.impers: Reference to the tooltip used by Terraria's developer items.
effect.chromaticarsenal.fractured.descri: Max health is reduced by 10% per level
effect.chromaticarsenal.inferno.descript: Sets the target on fire until the effect ends, cannot be extinguished by water
text.config.chromaticarsenal.title: Chromatic Arsenal Config
text.config.chromaticarsenal.option.COMM: The duration of the Absorption effect, in ticks. The effect is refreshed after this many ticks pass.
After blocking a hit, it will take this many ticks to be able to block another.
Magic damage received is multiplied by this value.
Magic damage dealt is multiplied by this value.
The highest possible light level in which the Shadow Treads' effect will activate. Note that very low values may not function as expected.
The speed increase caused by the Shadow Treads' effect. 0.2 is equal to +20%%.
The multiplier given to projectile attacks.
The duration of the Strength effect, in ticks. This is applied when consuming Magic Garlic Bread.
The duration of the Health Boost effect, in ticks. This is applied when consuming Magic Garlic Bread.
The duration, in ticks, that it takes to recover one point of durability. This can be halved by standing in powder snow.
The duration, in ticks, that it takes to begin recovering durability after taking too much fire damage.
This is a "multiply total" attribute, -0.25 is equal to -25%%. You shouldn't set this to -1 or below.
Lunar Crystal Safe Fall Distance Modifier
The number of additional blocks the wearer is able to fall without taking damage.
A 1 in X chance for any attack from the wearer to inflict Levitation.
The amount of additional damage snowballs deal when hitting an entity.
The amount of additional damage snowballs deal when hitting an entity vulnerable to freezing. This does not stack with Cryo Ring Snowball Damage.
The amount of ticks added to the freeze timer when an entity is hit by a snowball.
This is a "multiply total" attribute, 0.3 is equal to 30%%.
The amount added to the player's friction. Base friction is 0.6. Capped at 0.989 unless Extremely Unbalanced Mode is enabled.
Disables certain limits that prevent weird interactions caused by adding friction. Do not enable this unless you know what you are doing.
Gives additional max health corresponding to the %% of advancements completed, times this number, floored to the nearest even number.
Advancements which contain any of these keywords in their name are ignored. By default, ignores an impossible advancement from Enigmatic Legacy.
The duration of the positive effect given after sustaining lightning damage.
The amount of damage dealt to direct attackers.
When enabled, striking a Glass Shield with lightning creates a Thunderguard. Disable if you wish to create your own recipe.
The time, in minutes, for the Diamond Heart to be able to revive again. Also affects the Fractured duration.
Shield of Undying Death Clock Duration
The duration, in ticks, in which the wearer's death will be delayed.
The multiplier to the duration of effects received.
A list of effects which will not have their duration affected when received.
The maximum speed boost given at exactly midnight.
The maximum damage boost given at exactly noon.
The duration of the Inferno effect when attacking a mob.
The multiplier to damage when attacking mobs which are on fire
This is a "multiply total" attribute, -0.5 is equal to -50%%. You shouldn't set this to -1 or below.
A multiplier to the force given when bouncing out of the void.
The void damage dealt when bouncing out of the void.
tooltip.chromaticarsenal.super_glow_ring: §2Grants Night Vision, Glowing, and immunity to Blindness and Darkness
§6Attacking a mob inflicts Glowing for %1$s§6 seconds
§6Increases damage dealt to smite-vulnerable mobs by %1$s§b%%
text.config.chromaticarsenal.option.COMM: The maximum number of jumps able to be performed using the Harpy Feather.
The maximum number of jumps able to be performed using the Polychromatic Feather.
Ring of Illuminated Soul Glowing Duration
Ring of Illuminated Soul Undead Damage Multiplier
The multiplier given to damage against mobs vulnerable to smite.
text.config.chromaticarsenal.option.CLIE: Whenever ticks are converted to seconds in a tooltip, the decimal is kept if the resulting amount of seconds is under this value.
Prevents the Anonymity Umbrella from cloaking the wearer's skin. It will still hide their name tag.
